full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Net-Zero Advisory Board (NZAB) Graphics Design

#### Background
This retender announcement, posted on [Dataset Commencement Date], updates and replaces the initial request for proposal (RFP) 5000071501A. Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for the provision of Graphic Design Professional Services in support of the Net-Zero Advisory Board (NZAB). 

#### Overview
The selected supplier will provide graphic design services to create and produce standard templates and promotional materials to support the work of the NZAB. The contract term is expected to commence upon contract award and end on March 31, 2025. The option to extend the contract by up to four (4) additional one-year periods, subject to the same conditions, remains available.

#### Scope of Services
The successful bidder will be required to deliver graphic design services, including:
* Design creation for standard templates and promotional materials
* Issue of Task Authorizations for agreed-upon projects and requests for design services

#### Eligibility and Requirements
Potential suppliers must possess graphic design professional services capabilities and experience in Canada. The scope of work, detailed in the Statement of Work included in this RFP, outlines the specific requirements for delivering the contract services. Only Canadian-based companies, or international companies with a local presence in Canada, are eligible to participate.

#### Evaluation Criteria
Bidders will be evaluated based on the Canadian System for Tendering and Awarding Procurement Contracts (GSTAP) and the Evaluation Method outlined in this RFP. The evaluation will focus on both Technical Merit and Price, with the highest combined score determining the contract award.

#### How to Bid
Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through Canada Buys (canadabuys.canada.ca) by 2:00 PM (GDST) on [Tender Closing Date]. Suppliers must register on the platform prior to submission to ensure timely receipt of their bid. Late bids will not be accepted.

#### Supporting Documents 
Required documents, including this RFP, amendment documents, Non-Disclosure Agreement and acknowledgment form, are available on Canada Buys. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring they have access to all relevant documents before submitting their bid.

For further information, please contact Samantha Hatzinikou at (873) 500-0150 or via email at [samantha.hatzinikou@ec.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.hatzinikou@ec.gc.ca).
